user.title: Configure Glow: Sun Exposure for Vitamin D
user.description:
Set up your Vitamin D sun exposure calculator. This integration creates 6 sensors (one for each Fitzpatrick skin type) that calculate the minutes of midday sun exposure needed to maintain your target Vitamin D level.

**Important Medical Disclaimer:** This is for informational purposes only and is not medical advice. Always consult with a healthcare provider before making decisions about sun exposure. Excessive sun exposure increases skin cancer risk.

data_description.target_iu: Daily Vitamin D target in International Units (1000-4000 IU). Default: 2000 IU for maintenance of ~50 nmol/L blood level with 25% body exposure.
data_description.uv_sensor: Select a UV index sensor for real-time calculations. If not selected, will use monthly averages for your latitude.

abort.already_configured: This integration is already configured. Only one instance is allowed.
